result.name: detection-control-and-information-system--spectrum-data-dcis_1
result.notes: DCIS was the department's system for recording information about seizures of illicit goods; this has now been replaced by the Spectrum system. Updated: daily. Data coverage: 2001/02, 2002/03, 2003/04, 2004/05, 2005/06, 2006/07, 2007/08, 2008/09, 1998/99, 1999/00, 2000/01, 1996/97, 1997/98

organization.name: hm-revenue-and-customs
organization.title: HM Revenue and Customs
organization.description:
What we do

We are the UK’s tax authority. We are responsible for making sure that the money is available to fund the UK’s public services and for helping families and individuals with targeted financial support.

HMRC is a non-ministerial department, supported by 2 agencies and public bodies.

https://www.gov.uk/government/organisations/hm-revenue-customs

result.title: Detection Control and Information System / Spectrum data (DCIS)
